image, Calm rural landscape near Nykarleby at dawn. Fields and a faint river stretch under a thin layer of mist. Early morning light reveals soft blue and golden hues. Style follows classic DC Comics realism — clean composition, muted tones, subtle chiaroscuro. No visible figures; atmosphere of quiet anticipation.
September 13, 1808. The small village of Jutas near Nykarleby becomes the stage for a decisive encounter.

image, Finnish troops prepare defensive positions along a rural road and river near Nykarleby. Soldiers in blue-gray coats and brass buttons take cover behind fences and rocks. Mist lingers over the field. The tone is calm but tense — chiaroscuro lighting with golden sunrise through fog. DC Comics realism with layered depth and dynamic posture.
Swedish-Finnish forces, under Colonel Cronstedt, await the Russians advancing from the south.

image, A messenger gallops into the Finnish camp on a rearing horse, scattering mud and mist. Soldiers turn toward him in surprise. The scene is dynamic and diagonal in composition — strong DC Comics energy with bold outlines, chiaroscuro shading, and golden-blue highlights cutting through the morning fog.
Messenger: Von Döbeln is coming — but he is ill!
